title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4227.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4227.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Act shall mean
the Urban Development Corporation Act, ch. 174 of the Laws of 1968, as amended
from time to time. (b) Affirmative
action program shall mean a program developed by the affirmative action
department of the corporation establishing goals for participation by minority
group members and women in business and employment opportunities generated by
any project receiving financial assistance hereunder. (c) Applicant shall mean an applicant for
assistance hereunder submitting an application in accordance with section
4227.7
of this Part. (d) Application shall mean an application for
assistance hereunder substantially in the form described in section
4227.7
of this Part. (e) Child care facilities construction
project shall mean a project for the establishment, expansion and development
of licensed, not-for-profit child day care centers intended to serve the needs
of low-income working families, economically distressed areas or highly
distressed communities. (f) Corporation shall mean the New York State Urban Development Corporation, a
public benefit corporation created by chapter 174 of the Laws of 1968, as
amended. (g) Department shall mean
the New York State Department of Social Services. (h) Directors shall mean the members of the
board of directors of the corporation. (i) Economically distressed areas shall have
the meaning assigned to such term in section 16-d of the act. (j) Eligible project shall mean a child care
facilities construction project eligible for assistance from the corporation
hereunder in accordance with the criteria set forth in section
4227.3
of this Part. (k) Eligible recipient shall mean a
not-for-profit corporation. (l) Highly distressed shall have the meaning assigned to such term in section 16-d
of the act. (m) Not-for-profit
corporation shall mean a corporation organized under the Not-for-Profit

Corporation Law of the State. (n) Project shall mean a child care facilities construction project. (o) State shall mean the State of New

York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4227.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
